metadata.name: Hogushi Water 1
metadata.description:
Hogushi Water - ほぐし水

Hogushi Water is water to add to packaged noodles, (provided in a separate packet); softening water; loosening water. 
It is a unique Japanese invention and a very interesting one.
It is symbolic of the act of giving water a name and a role. It is the act of man giving value to matter, and it applies to many entities in our society.

Using Hogushi Water as a motif, this video work is about the act of giving existence to water and matter.
